news.content:
üóû ThreeFold in the News üóû


"Through this historic partnership, Paradise Hills and ThreeFold will provide every homeowner of the gated residence with a pre-installed 3Node, a dedicated server that provides the edge computing and internet storage needed to run decentralized applications and internet services.‚Äù


ThreeFold Is Bringing The Power Of Blockchain And The Decentralized Cloud To A Dubai Neighborhood, via Crypto Daily.


Full article here.


More to come, as we're in talks with other communities to scale this model across the globe. üåç
news.excerpt: ThreeFold Is Bringing The Power Of Blockchain And The Decentralized Cloud To A Dubai Neighborhood ‚Äì via Crypto Daily

next.title: Paradise Hills Property Development and ThreeFold to Establish the World‚Äôs First Neighborhood Cloud in Dubai
next.excerpt: ThreeFold and Paradise Hills join forces to bring the world‚Äôs largest decentralized Internet Cloud powered by the ThreeFold Blockchain into Homes.
